shortdesc.ph: Reason for music file playback state change. Reported in the callback.
Reason for music file playback state change. Reported in the callback.
Reason for music file playback state change. Reported in the callback.
Reason for music file playback state change. Reported in the callback.

plentry.pd: 0: Successfully opened the music file.
701: Failed to open the music file. For example, the local music file does not exist, the file format is not supported, or the online music file URL is not accessible.
702: Music file opened too frequently. If you need to call multiple times, make sure the interval between calls is greater than 500 ms.
703: Music file playback was interrupted.
721: One loop of the music file playback completed.
723: All loops of the music file playback completed.
724: Successfully called to stop music file playback.
0: Music file opened successfully.
701: Failed to open music file. For example, the local music file does not exist, the file format is not supported, or the online music file URL is inaccessible.
702: Music file opened too frequently. If you need to call multiple times, ensure the interval between calls is more than 500 ms.
703: Music file playback interrupted.
721: One loop of the music file playback completed.
723: All loops of the music file playback completed.
724: Successfully called to stop music file playback.
0: Successfully opened the music file.
701: Failed to open the music file. For example, the local file does not exist, the format is not supported, or the online music file URL is inaccessible.
702: Music file is opened too frequently. If you need to call multiple times, ensure the interval between calls is greater than 500 ms.
703: Music file playback interrupted.
721: One loop of music file playback completed.
723: All loops of music file playback completed.
724: Successfully stopped music file playback by calling .
0: Music file opened successfully.
701: Failed to open music file. For example, the local music file does not exist, the file format is not supported, or the online music file URL is inaccessible.
702: Music file opened too frequently. If you need to call startAudioMixing multiple times, ensure the interval between calls is greater than 500 ms.
703: Music file playback interrupted.
721: One loop of music file playback completed.
723: All loops of music file playback completed.
724: Music file playback stopped successfully by calling .
